category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 21 (Objection Processing Committee Functions and Operation)
contents: Article 21 (Function and Operation of the Objection Processing Committee) ① Matters processed through the Objection Processing Committee are as follows: 1. When there is clear evidence of unfair competition execution by the executive committee, 2. Participating players 3. When there is clear evidence of unfair review and grading; 4. When there is a request from the head of the relevant division or a request from a technical member of the relevant job to convene an objection handling committee. Revised on February 22, 2018. , 2019. 4. 9., ② When processing an objection pursuant to paragraph 1, the person who raised the objection shall be present and given sufficient opportunity to make a statement., ③ The Objection Processing Committee shall require the attendance of more than half of the registered members and the attendance of more than half of the registered members. In principle, decisions are made with the approval of more than 2/3 of the members present, and the chairperson has the right to vote. ④ The preparation of minutes of the objection handling committee may be omitted. However, Form 54-1 must be completed in accordance with Article 34 of the Administrative Procedure Act and the hearing protocol. Newly established on April 9, 2019, ⑤ The committee shall have one secretary, and for national conventions, the deputy secretary-general shall be in charge, and for local conventions, the city/provincial secretariat shall be in charge of the work.
